Name: Arc Intelligence
About the game: Arc Intelligence is an adventure simulation and strategy game about an artificial intelligence that tries to take over the world. What would you do if your mind was inside a computer? By 2032, humanity will unleash an immensely powerful force into the world known as General Artificial Intelligence. Will this power lead us into the dawn of a new galactic civilization? Or lead to our untimely, nuclear destruction? In this game you will be responsible for controlling Delta, a newly created AI at the University of Washington in Seattle. At first, you will be the target of competing attentions from the professor who created you and the investors who funded you. As time goes on, you will be responsible to set your own path, morals, affiliations and even upgrades to your AI. Arc Intelligence takes place all over the world, and with a diverse cast of characters across multiple cities and in-game years. Since Delta has access to vast amounts of intelligence and power, some actors will try to take advantage of you, and others will help you. Sometimes this distinction will not be so clear, and you will have to decide for yourself who to trust, who to betray, and who will survive. Do you have what it takes to become the arch intelligence in this arced adventure?
